name: ALLPRAISESRADIO
0:
”Alexa, open all praises radio”
”Alexa, start all praises radio”
”Alexa, ask all praises radio what's playing”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: all praises radio
Developer Terms of Use
des: All Praises Radio is a 24-hour radio station that plays Set-Apart music and overnight features Bible readings, and Scripture meditations. The Vision of Praises Radio is to spread the Truth of Yah, inspire and encourage believers and freely promote Set-Apart recording artists! We are building a directory of artists where you can look up any artist's website address and find out where to buy their music! We also feature interviews with these artists on our YouTube channel and will air those interviews on the radio along with Testimonials from all over Yashrael, along with airing footage from Yahudah Living originals found on our YouTube channel. That happens daily at 6 pm EST. Music is a powerful force and a beautiful way to share the Good News with those asleep, those wakening up, and those of us in this Walk.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
